original_text: Aaron replied to Moses, “Today they sacrificed their sin offering and their burnt offering before the Lord, but such things as this have happened to me. Would the Lord have been pleased if I had eaten the sin offering today?”
korean_text: 아론이 모세에게 이르되 오늘 그들이 그 속죄제와 번제를 여호와께 드렸어도 이런 일이 내게 임하였거늘 오늘 내가 속죄제물을 먹었더라면 여호와께서 어찌 좋게 여기셨으리요

sentences.original_text: Today they sacrificed their sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 그들은 그들의 속죄 제물을 드렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and their burnt offering before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주님 앞에서 그들의 번제물을 드렸습니다

sentences.original_text: but such things as this have happened to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이와 같은 일들이 내게 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: Would the Lord have been pleased
if I had eaten the sin offering today
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 오늘 속죄 제물을 먹었다면
